headline.main: Syrian Army Said to Be Closer to Retaking Palmyra

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A state news agency said the army regained control of the citadel in Palmyra after heavy fighting with the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: A state news agency said the army regained control of the citadel in Palmyra after heavy fighting with the Islamic State.
